attributes.action: Stop spending £12,000,000,000 each year in overseas aid
attributes.additional_details:
Stop sending over Twelve Billion Pounds (£12,000,000,000) of OUR money to other countries each year, while we are on our knees, struggling to survive.  We have sent millions of pounds to countries including Iran and North Korea.  This money would pay for 230,000 Teachers and Nurses and help bring Britain back from the brink.

We send a billion pounds to India who are the fastest developing country on the planet with a space programme and nuclear weapons.

When will this despicable waste of our money end.
